title: Typewriter, "Erika", ca. 1927
medium: Metal, plastic, rubber, leather, inked ribbon
creditline: Gift of Barry Friedman and Patricia Pastor
description: Typewriter (a) in black metal housing on flat base. Open keyboard and mechanics; black ribbon. White plastic keys with metal rims. Black leather-covered lid (b) with handle at front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Typewriter, "Erika", ca. 1927.
ca. 1927. Metal, plastic, rubber, leather, inked ribbon. Gift of Barry Friedman and Patricia Pastor. 1986-99-19.
